attributes.action: Write to Arun District Council in support of SeaFiSh
attributes.additional_details:
The statment finishes with 'The Subcommittee are asked to seriously consider suitability of the venue for musical entertainment'.

If you think SeaFish is not causing a disorder or publice nusisance and that Bognor benefits from its provision of poetry & music, eg Dodgy, David Devant and His Spirit Wife, Attila The Stockbroker, links with Sky Arts and that having Eat Static, Mark Morriss of The Bluetones, The Members and more is actually contributing to the town's regeneration, please sign.
attributes.background: Arun District Council have applied for a review of SeaFiSh's licence, claiming an adverse affect on the local community, not operating within licence perameters, and the prevention of crime and disorder.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You can petition Arun District Council here:

http://www.arun.gov.uk/petitions
